content:
Here's the updated folder structure of the app after implementing all the changes we've discussed:
```php
my-tiktok-clone/
├── public/
│   ├── global.css
│   └── index.html
├── src/
│   ├── components/
│   │   ├── Conversations.svelte
│   │   ├── Home.svelte
│   │   ├── Login.svelte
│   │   ├── Messages.svelte
│   │   ├── Signup.svelte
│   │   └── VideoPlayer.svelte
│   ├── lib/
│   │   └── supabase.js
│   ├── App.svelte
│   └── main.js
├── package.json
└── README.md
```
This folder structure assumes you have added the `Conversations.svelte` and `Messages.svelte` components as discussed in previous answers. Components are organized within the `src/components` directory, and the Supabase client setup is in the `src/lib` directory.
